paragraphs.body: Thailog and I talked a bit about this on on my talk page. I would like to hide all titles from user pages. See User:The 888th Avatar for an example. This will mean you can see more of the user page when it loads, and it means less annoying redundancy between the masthead and the page. If anyone doesn't like this idea, you're at the right place. Thanks. Wjxhuang, the 888th Avatar {Talk} 10:47, 9 August 2009 (UTC)
paragraphs.text: Thailog and I talked a bit about this on on my talk page. I would like to hide all titles from user pages. See User:The 888th Avatar for an example. paragraphs.body: If you could please add the following CSS, it will be used for Template:Navbox, which is incomplete until the CSS is added. I have a line of navboxes planned for the wiki, and hope they are found useful.
